sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <textarea v-model="replyContent" placeholder="Write a comment..." :rows="3" required></textarea>
    <button>Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "CommentForm",
  props: {
    newReplyContent: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
    addComment: {
      type: Function,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      replyContent: this.newReplyContent
    }
  },
  watch: {
    newReplyContent(newVal) {
      this.replyContent = newVal
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleSubmit() {
      this.addComment(this.newReplyContent)
      newReplyContent = ""
    }
  }
}
</script>
